tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE expenditures (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  recipient_name TEXT,
  category TEXT,
  amount DECIMAL,
  date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE expenditures (
    expenditure_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    recipient VARCHAR,
    amount DECIMAL,
    date DATE,
    campaign_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE contributions (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    donor_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    amount DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    contributor_type TEXT,
    donation_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE expenditures (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    recipient TEXT NOT NULL,
    amount DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    purpose TEXT,
    expenditure_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE donors (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    donor_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    phone_number TEXT,
    email TEXT,
    address TEXT
);
